title: #11: Bullets & Ballots
description:
The gun control debate is not going away anytime soon, but is there something deeper behind the push to disarm the population?

All desperate governments resort to disarming the population before they round them up and slaughter them. Over 144,000,000 people were murdered by their own government over the last century, and what was the common thread before that happened? The population was completely disarmed.

Think you can vote these maniacs out of office? Good luck with that. The system is rigged to keep a constant flow of grifters coming into political office to maintain the status quo.
